TopicTitle: I managed to make the planet cease from existing

Articles.Content:
So I birthed the Kraken. I made a massive ship and it spazzed out and killed me at 331,440,000,000,000 degrees Fahrenheit. I reloaded the save the next day and the entire planet was half see-through and half opaque. I get into space and Kerbin disappeared, got out of my craft, and when I tried to get back in it crashed. I just need to know what went wrong.

Here is my error.log if you need it;

 

[GIANT WALL OF LOG REMOVED]

 

 

 

Sorry if this is not how this works, I'm a noob on the forums.

Edited April 28, 2019 by Gargamel
Huge wall of text removed.

First, please don't post whole logs on the forums.  Small sections (a couple dozen lines at most) are ok, but full log files make it difficult to read for some users on various platforms.  If you must post a log, please use an offsite hosting service, like dropbox or google drive, and link to it here.  

Secondly, error log usually only shows what is happening with your computer, not within the game itself.   We'll need you to recreate the occurrence, and then host your output.log file and link it here, as described:

Thirdy, well..... kraken attacks are usually very hard to isolate.   Usually, in this type of attack, it boils down to "figure out what you did" and then "don't do that again".   There is a youtuber who is famous for finding such attacks and playing with them.  But the vague nature of what exactly happened makes it difficult to figure what went wrong.  

When you say massive, what's massive?   500 parts?  1000?  What did you do right before the spazz attack?
